mapper.select: /* cetusDatasetFile.getFileInfoByFileId */ SELECT FILE_UID ,FILE_ID ,FILE_PATH ,ORG_FILE_NM ,METADATA_ID ,RAWDATA_ID FROM CETUS_DATASET_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId}

/* cetusDatasetFile.getFileList */ SELECT FILE_UID ,FILE_ID ,FILE_NM ,ORG_FILE_NM ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_URL ,FILE_SIZE ,FILE_TYPE ,EXTENSION ,DOWN_CNT ,USE_AT ,REG_DT ,UPDT_DT ,SAVED ,REG_ID ,METADATA_ID ,RAWDATA_ID ,DATA_TP_CD FROM CETUS_DATASET_FILE WHERE FILE_UID = #{fileUid} AND SAVED = 'Y' AND USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
